price: (Saa ara) nso na obi a, ɔbɛdi dwuma bͻne bi a emu duro ketekete te sε aboboaa a (onipa) ani ntumi nhunu no (ͻno nso) bɛhunu (n'adeε).
arabic: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waman yaʿmal mith'qāla dharratin sharran yarahu
